## Coastal Shark Bottom Longline Survey

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# generate token
token = arcgisutils::auth_client()

# feature server url
csbll_url =  'https://services2.arcgis.com/C8EMgrsFcRFL6LrL/arcgis/rest/services/Coastal_Shark_Bottom_Longline_Survey_Strata/FeatureServer'

# metadata
csbll_meta = arcgisutils::fetch_layer_metadata(url = csbll_url, token = token)
```

### ArcGIS Feature Service

Click [here](`r csbll_url`).

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# InPort
inport_href = csbll_meta$serviceDescription |>
  rvest::read_html() |>
  rvest::html_node('a') |>
  rvest::html_attr('href')

# description
csbll_desc = gsub('(.*?)</a>\\.\\s+', '', csbll_meta$serviceDescription)
```

### InPort Metadata

Yes, see [here](`r inport_href`).

### Description

`r csbll_desc`

### Spatial Extent

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# get layer bounding box
csbll_bb = data.frame(
  x = c(csbll_meta$fullExtent$xmin, csbll_meta$fullExtent$xmax), 
  y = c(csbll_meta$fullExtent$ymin, csbll_meta$fullExtent$ymax)) |>
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c('x', 'y'), crs = csbll_meta$fullExtent$spatialReference$latestWkid) |>
  sf::st_bbox() |>
  sf::st_as_sfc() |>
  sf::st_transform(4326)
  
# leaflet map
leaflet::leaflet() |>
  leaflet::addTiles() |>
  leaflet::addPolygons(data = csbll_bb)
```

### Layers

```{r, echo = FALSE}
csbll_meta$layers |>
  dplyr::select(id, name, type, geometryType) |>
  knitr::kable()
```

### Fields

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
# layers 
csbll_layers = csbll_meta$layers

# loop over layers
csbll_fields = purrr::map(.x = 1:nrow(csbll_layers), .f = function(.x) {
  
  # open layer
  csbll_layer = arcgislayers::arc_open(url = paste0(csbll_url, '/', csbll_layers$id[.x]), token = token)
  
  # get fields
  csbll_fields = arcgislayers::list_fields(csbll_layer) |>
    dplyr::select(name, alias, description, actualType) |>
    dplyr::rename(dataType = actualType)
  
  # format description
  csbll_fields = csbll_fields |>
    dplyr::mutate(description = gsub(':|\\"', '', stringr::str_extract(description, ':\\s*([^,]+)'))) |>
    dplyr::filter(!name %in% c('Shape__Area', 'Shape__Length'))
  
  # output
  cat('\n####', csbll_layers$name[.x], '\n')
    print(knitr::kable(csbll_fields))
  cat('\n')

})

```
